text.en: Oṃ! Homage to you, lady who protects us from the eight fears!
text.en-trans: om, jikpa gyé kyobma la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, lady who blazes with the splendour of auspiciousness!
Homage to you, lady who closes the door to lower rebirth!
text.en-trans: ngensong go gekma la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to you, lady who leads us on the path to higher realms!
text.en-trans: tori lam drenma la chaktsal lo

text.en: You are the one who holds us always in your care—our guide, support and friend;
So protect us still, we pray, with all of your vast compassion!
